name: FORTIGATE DLP [File Detected]
description: Fortinet Fortigate Unified Threat Management DLP events that were not blocked and are not whitelisted. Review filename and destination domain, may be potential exfil of sensitive data either by attacker or by insider threat.
query: class:fortinet_fortigate action!:`block` category:[`utm-dlp`,`utm:dlp`] severity=warning has:filename NOT (dstdomain:`akamai.com` filename=`ncsi.txt`) NOT (dstdomain:`fortinet.com` filename:`fdsupdate`) NOT srcipv4:$exclusions.global.srcipv4
